Name: Exphelius: Arena
About the game: Strap yourself in and prepare for an explosive career as a participant of the Exphelius Championships. Contestants battle it out in various dangerous arenas for the top spot. Use earnings from matches to upgrade your ride and prove your worth in Exphelius: Arena. PICK YOUR RIDE Choose from 12 unique ships and skins from several of Exphelius' manufacturers, each with their own quirks and strengths that can shape your play style. Find one that fits your style or strive to master them all. Buy parts or win them and upgrade your ship's performance across several stats. Level up through play and unlock new and more powerful components. Build the ultimate killing machine. TACTICAL GAMEPLAY Shoot from afar or go in for a high speed collision. Collect devastating or tactical powerups to take control of the arena. There is something for everyone's playstyle. BEAUTIFUL ARENAS Enjoy 10 stunning arenas, each with their own unique flavour and lore. Explosive visual effects mixed with colourful pixel graphics and blood-pumping music makes for fast-paced action where every kill or dodge can make or break your match. BECOME THE CHAMPION Beat the heat and beat the hazards. Conquer each arena and game mode and become the Champion of the Exphelius arenas. Are you up to the challenge?
